mapper.sql: b.beacon_uid AS beacon_uid ,b.name AS name ,f.name AS factory_name ,z.name AS zone_name ,IF(b.is_activated = 1, '활성', '비활성') AS activated_status ,b.is_activated ,IF(b.battery > 0, 'O', 'X') AS battery_ox ,b.battery AS battery ,DATE_FORMAT(b.upd_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS upd_date
WHERE b.zone_uid = z.zone_uid AND z.factory_uid = f.factory_uid

SELECT beacon_uid ,zone_uid
,name
,minor ,signal_period ,txpower ,description
,DATE_FORMAT(upd_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS upd_date FROM
WHERE beacon_uid = #{beacon_uid}
